name: 李有豐
objective:
本課程將包括:
基本數學與變分法；線性彈性力學;能量法; .Euler梁與Timoshenko梁;扭力;古典板理論; 塑性力學簡介


=======================
This course contains:
Basic mathematics; Calculus of variations; Linear elasticity;  Energy metho; Midterm exam;  Euler and Timoshenko Beams; Torsion;   Classuical Plate Theory;  Introduction to Plasticity
schedule:
第1-2周 0. 基本數學  
第3周 1.變分法        
第4-6周 2.線性彈性力學       
第7-8周 3.能量法 
第9周      期中考
第10-12周 4.Euler梁與Timoshenko梁      
第13-14周 5.扭力    
第14-16周 6.古典板理論
第17周      7.塑性力學簡介.
第18周      期末考
====================
1-2 week    Basic mathematics  
3 week       Calculus of variations        
4-6 week       Linear elasticity       
7-8 week       Energy method
9 week          Midterm exam
10-12week    Euler and Timoshenko Beams      
13-14 week   Torsion
14-16 week   Classuical Plate Theory
17 week        Introduction to Plasticity
18 week        Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考30%(總分30分)           
期末考30%           
平時成績40%(書面報告、作業、出席、其他)

=====================================
Midterm exam              　　                                         30%
Final exam                                                                 30%
Attend to class, homework, report and presentation       40%
materials:
1. Dym and Shames, "Solid Mechanics"
2. Timoshenko, "Elasticity"
3. 錢偉長, "彈性力學"
